data.title: Claudiu Beletoiu | Running Coach - TrainingPeaks
data.snippet:
WHO IS THE COACH?  
Claudiu Belețoiu, ultramarathoner, graduate of the Faculty of Physical Education and Sport (Licence degree + Master degree), as well as a sports pedagogy module.  
3rd place finisher at the most difficult mountain running competition in Europe and olso outside Europe (Tor des Glaciers, 450k, +32,000mD+), finisher of the longest trail race in Europe (Cursa di Ciclopi, 525k, 6th place), winner of the 360 ​​the challenge race (2023). Other races can be found on my ITRA account.

Even if my focus is on trail for my running career, i am also a sub 3 hours marathon runner so i have the proper knoledge also in road running, not only from the theoretical education but also from my experience. [...] Claudiu Beletoiu
TrainingPeaks Certified Coach Level 2

I am a running coach that is ready to help you to achieve your dreams (regarding sports activities). I am also a runner that it is in activity, mostly in trail running ( races more than 100 km up to my longest race 525 km ). I have an experience of more that 13 years on running and more than 5 years on coaching. [...] In over 13 years of experience in mountain running, road and track, I managed to have over 100 races to my credit.

I have more than 5 years of coaching, time in wich i have worked with a lot of athletes.

Toghether we have the chance to create the best athlete that you can be. If you are focused and serious for sure the results will be a fact. My way of coaching it is focused on longevity, because this should be the most important for all of us, to be able to do sports activity even when we will get old.

I am looking forward to work with you.

#### Unexpected Error

We're sorry. We weren't able to send your email. Please make sure your browser cookie support is enabled and try again.

Aleea Ilia Nr 4 Bl 58 C, 78  
București  
Romania  
021825

data.title: Claudio Romero - Wikipedia
data.snippet:
Claudio Ignacio Romero Beltrán (born 10 July 2000) is a Chilean track and field athlete competing in the discus throw.

In 2017, he won the gold medal in the men's discus throw event at the 2017 IAAF World U18 Championships held in Nairobi, Kenya.[citation needed]

In 2018, he won the bronze medal in the men's discus throw event at the 2018 IAAF World U20 Championships held in Tampere, Finland.

In 2019, he competed in the men's discus throw event at the 2019 Pan American Games held in Lima, Peru. He did not record a mark. He also won a gold medal in the discus throw at the 2019 Pan American U20 Championships in San José, Costa Rica, extending his national record with a mark of 62.30 meters. data.title: Claudiu Niculescu - Wikipedia
data.snippet:
Claudiu Iulian Niculescu (born 23 June 1976) is a Romanian football coach and former striker "Striker (association football)"), currently in charge of Liga II club CSM Slatina "CSM Slatina (football)").

## Club career

[edit]

> "Claudiu is one of the strikers with the highest qualities I have ever met."

–José Ramón Alexanko, former Universitatea Craiova manager
